tool_description: Modifies existing skincare routines to accommodate seasonal changes in weather, humidity, and skin needs throughout the year.

target_season.description: Season to adjust for: spring, summer, fall, winter

climate_type.description: Climate type: humid, dry, temperate, tropical

current_skin_concerns.description: Current skin concerns that may change seasonally

error_messages: Invalid season: Use spring, summer, fall, or winter
Invalid climate type: Use humid, dry, temperate, or tropical
Insufficient routine: Need at least 3 products in current routine
Too many concerns: Maximum 4 seasonal concerns can be addressed
Empty routine: Current routine cannot be empty
usage: Input current routine products, target season, climate type, and current skin concerns. Tool suggests modifications for seasonal optimization.

products_to_modify.description: Products that should be changed for the season

seasonal_additions.description: New products to add for seasonal needs

adjustment_rationale.description: Explanation of why adjustments are needed
